text: All Night Long is a 1981 comedy movie starring Barbra Streisand, Gene Hackman, Diane Ladd, Dennis Quaid, Kevin Dobson, and William Daniels. It was written by W. D. Richter and directed by Jean-Claude Tramont.Christopher Nickens; Karen Swenson, The Films of Barbra Streisand (New York, NY: Citadel Press, 2000), pp. 152-160 ==Box office== The movie was generally a failure. It had an opening weekend of about $1.4 million and grossed around $10 million worldwide. This is a little over $26 million in 2016 dollars. It was nominated for Worst Actress at the Golden Raspberry Awards in 1982. == References == Category:1981 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies
title: All Night Long (1981 movie)
